actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a demonstration program to support college and university communities that wish to expand their book store services and savings for students through the creation of course material rental programs.

summary.text: Affordable Books for College Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a demonstration program of loans to expand college bookstore services to provide students with the option to rent course materials.Directs the Secretary of Education to make such loans to a limited number of eligible entities, as well as feasibility study grants prior to loan applications.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a demonstration program to support college and university communities that wish to expand their book store services and savings for students through the creation of course material rental programs.
